trans-unit.resname: DDP·9 | Sheer Drop | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Destroy target tapped creature.\nAwaken 3—{5}{W} (If you cast this spell for {5}{W}, also put three +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标已横置的生物。醒转3～{5}{W}（如果你支付{5}{W}来施放此咒语，则另在目标由你操控的地上放置三个+1/+1指示物，且它成为0/0，具敏捷异能的元素生物。它仍然是地。）

trans-unit.resname: DDP·21 | Retreat to Kazandu | Card Name
DDP·21 | Retreat to Kazandu | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, choose one —
trans-unit.target: 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，选择一项～

trans-unit.resname: DDP·21 | Retreat to Kazandu | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: • Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
trans-unit.target: •在目标生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: DDP·21 | Retreat to Kazandu | Card Text | Paragraph 3
DDP·27 | Veteran Warleader | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.\nTap another untapped Ally you control: CARDNAME gains your choice of first strike, vigilance, or trample until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 老练领战人的力量和防御力各等同于由你操控的生物数量。横置另一个由你操控且未横置的伙伴：选择先攻，警戒或践踏。老练领战人获得该异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: DDP·41 | Oblivion Sower | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you cast this spell, target opponent exiles the top four cards of their library, then you may put any number of land cards that player owns from exile onto the battlefield under your control.
trans-unit.target: 当你施放夺忆恶体时，目标对手放逐其牌库顶的四张牌，然后你可以将任意数量由该牌手拥有的地牌从放逐区在你操控下放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: DDP·51 | Dominator Drone | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Devoid (This card has no color.)\nIngest (Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of their library.)\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if you control another colorless creature, each opponent loses 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 虚色（此牌没有颜色。）摄食（每当此生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，该牌手放逐其牌库顶牌。）当主宰奴兽进战场时，若你操控另一个无色生物，则每位对手各失去2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: DDP·64 | Forerunner of Slaughter | Card Name
DDP·64 | Forerunner of Slaughter | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Devoid (This card has no color.)\n{1}: Target colorless creature gains haste until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 虚色（此牌没有颜色。）{1}：目标无色生物获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。
